issue.title: [CF 206] SpellDamageTaken not working for Jinx
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: Attaching a saved variables file/screenshot will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved.
Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Set up an icon for SpellDamageTaken debuff on target that shows when absent.
2. Cast Curse of the Elements on a target with an affliction specced warlock with 2/2 Jinx talent.
3. Select another target within 40 yard range that has the Jinx: Curse of the Elements debuff.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
The SpellDamageTaken debuff lists JInx:Curse of the Elements in the breakdown for the debuff but it doesn't seem to work for JInx.  If I select the target which I originally cast Curse of the Elements on, the icon correctly does not appear.  However, when I select the target with the Jinx:Curse of the Elements debuff, the icon appears when it should not.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.1.4.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user ruku320 | Imported from CurseForge issue #206 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user ruku320

Looks like I was using the wrong spellID. Will be fixed in the next version.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
